AllTokenPaused(address).notice: Emitted when the pause is triggered by account.

AllTokenUnpaused(address).notice: Emitted when the pause is lifted by account.

TokenPaused(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when the pause of token is triggered by account.

TokenUnpaused(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when the pause of token is lifted by account.

pauseAllToken().notice: WARNING! pause and unpause controls the token selling functions, but not the transfers
